import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useRouter } from "next/router"; import firebase from "../../../config/firebase"; import { toast } from "react-toastify"; import { Alert } from "reactstrap"; const URL = process.env.REACT_APP_WEBSOCKET_ENDPOINT; const DOMAIN = process.env.REACT_APP_DEFAULT_DOMAIN; const { client } = require("@xmpp/client"); const debug = require("@xmpp/debug"); let clientXmpp = client({ service: URL, domain: DOMAIN, resource: "WebApp-login", username: "", password: "", transport: "websocket", }); const Auth_SignIn = (props) => { let errorArray = []; let error; const [credential, setCredential] = useState({ email: "", password: "", errors: [], loading: false, }); const router = useRouter(); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setCredential({ ...credential, [name]: value }); }; // simple login const userLogin = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); if (isFormValid()) { console.log("not empty"); } else { console.log("not valid"); } }; const isFormValid = () => { console.log("is form valid"); if (isFormEmpty(credential.email, credential.password)) { error = { message: "Please Fill all the Fields" }; setCredential({ ...credential, errors: errorArray.concat(error) }); return false; } else { return true; } }; const isFormEmpty = (email, password) => { return !email.length && !password.length; }; const displayErrors = () => credential.errors.map((error, i) => ( {error.message} )); const redirectToSignUpPage = () => { console.log("signup"); router.push("/auth/signUp"); }; return (

Hello Everyone , We are Chitchat

Welcome to chitchat please login to your account.

{credential.errors.length > 0 && displayErrors()}
handleChange(e)} name="email" value={credential.email} type="email" placeholder="Demo@123gmail.com" />
handleChange(e)} name="password" type="password" value={credential.password} placeholder="*******" />
Forgot Password?

); }; export default Auth_SignIn;
